text.content:
Rattled

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused} for 1 round.

Bludgeoning

Guarded Strike

Crit Effect: Gain +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Piercing

Severed Tendon

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -5-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-5-foot status penalty to land Speed}.

Slashing

Power Surge

Triple damage.

Bomb or Spell
